resources.string: Length of the missing side: %1$.2f cm
Welcome to the Pythagorean Theorem App! This app is designed to help you understand and calculate triangles using the Pythagorean Theorem easily and quickly.
The Pythagorean Theorem App is designed to assist users in understanding and applying the Pythagorean Theorem in triangle calculations.
Illustration of the Pythagorean Theorem formula

The Pythagorean Theorem states that in a right triangle, the square of the length of the hypotenuse (the side opposite the right angle) is equal to the sum of the squares of the lengths of the other two sides.
